name: NUKED KNIGHT
description: You will play for a stump of a finger, pass the mysterious and colorful levels filled with different objects and puzzles.
minimum_requirements: OS: windows 7 Processor: 1 Ghz Graphics: 1024 mb video memory DirectX: Version 10 Storage: 280 MB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: windows 7 Processor: 1 Ghz Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: 1024 mb video memory DirectX: Version 10 Storage: 280 MB available space

reviews.review_text: Well the game works kind of...... It's a simple platform game where you basically move left or right in combination with jumping, avoid the traps and you win. It felt like sometimes you got a big jump and sometimes it was a small jump, I don't know why or if it was me. The music, it feels a bit heavy for this type of game.... I think it has potential as a kids game but not at this price point(Â£3.99). I cannot recomend this game, maybe that will change in the future if there are some updates...
